mapper.select: SELECT faq_no as faqNo, category as category, title as title, content as content, user_id as userId, regdate as regdate, end_yn as endYN FROM faq where end_yn='N'

SELECT notice_No as noticeNo, title as title, content as content, regdate as regdate, user_name as username FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order BY notice_no DESC)AS NUM, notice.notice_No, notice.title, notice.content, notice.regdate ,USER_NAME FROM notice LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON(notice.user_id=MEMBER.USER_ID) WHERE notice.END_YN='N' ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM notice WHERE end_YN='N'

SELECT notice_No as noticeNo, title as title, content as content, regdate as regdate, user_name as username FROM notice LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON(notice.user_id=MEMBER.USER_ID) WHERE NOTICE_NO =#{notice_no} AND notice.END_YN='N'

SELECT notice_No as noticeNo, title as title, content as content, regdate as regdate, user_name as username FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order BY notice_no DESC)AS NUM, notice.notice_No, notice.title, notice.content, notice.regdate ,USER_NAME FROM notice LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON(notice.user_id=MEMBER.USER_ID) WHERE notice.END_YN='N' AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM notice WHERE end_YN='N' AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
